title: Looking for Plat + Flex   TOP>ADC>MID
body:
Hey,

We've got a consistent 3 man team looking for the extra two players to fill the void. 
We're looking to play flex consistently aiming for challenger next season. 

The preference is currently Toplane or Adc mains and possibly mid.

Requirements are:
-Working Mic & discord
-active communication (extra points for active macro/shotcalling)
-No baby rage

If you add me and below Plat in flex, you will be removed instantly. 
If you're interested add "Navi" or "E Z"  and say you're from the forum post. 

Cheers
